docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, March 18--The treaty of friendship, commerce and economic development signed by the United States and Uruguay here on Nov. 23 faces a strong fight in the Uruguayan Congress, which includes five Communist Deputies and one...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, March 18--The treaty of friendship, commerce and economic development signed by the United States and Uruguay here on Nov. 23 faces a strong fight in the Uruguayan Congress, which includes five Communist Deputies and one Communist woman Senator.
docs.abstract: ratification of pact with US faces fight

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, March 19--A five-nation investigating committee asserted today that Cuba, Guatemala and the Dominican Republic were involved in plots, conspiracies and attempted invasions that had kept the Caribbean in turmoil for three years.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 19--A five-nation investigating committee asserted today that Cuba, Guatemala and the Dominican Republic were involved in plots, conspiracies and attempted invasions that had kept the Caribbean in turmoil for three years.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, March 19--Right across the river from the site of the greatest press-freedom fight in this hemisphere, this Uruguayan capital is maintaining the nation's tradition of civil liberties despite the fact that it is thereby involved...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, March 19--Right across the river from the site of the greatest press-freedom fight in this hemisphere, this Uruguayan capital is maintaining the nation's tradition of civil liberties despite the fact that it is thereby involved in a basic ideological clash with its powerful neighbor, Argentina.
docs.abstract: Fight to maintain press freedom in face of Argentine moves discussed
